Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are not stopping from 63rd to 79th due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are not stopping from 63rd to 79th due to a track condition.

Shuttle buses are available between Garfield and 95th.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
